item.title: First post
item.description: Welcome to my first post! This is just a little one to get this section started. I’ve tried building this site before with Jekyll, but I was running into some issues with adding content in a smooth fashion. I’m hoping blogdown will be a bit smoother of a process so that I can start sharing content that I hope will be of value. Stay tuned!
item.content:
Welcome to my first post! This is just a little one to get this section started. I’ve tried building this site before with Jekyll, but I was running into some issues with adding content in a smooth fashion. I’m hoping blogdown will be a bit smoother of a process so that I can start sharing content that I hope will be of value.

Stay tuned!
